params.maxCost: Maximum USDC willing to pay (including fees) for slippage protection
params.tokenAmount: Amount of tokens to buy (18 decimals)

returns.timeLeft: Time left in seconds (0 if expired)

returns.potentialRefund: Potential refund if selling all tokens now

params.initialPrice_: Initial token price in USDC (6 decimals)

params.minRefund: Minimum USDC expected (after fees) for slippage protection
params.tokenAmount: Amount of tokens to sell (18 decimals)

triggerRefund().details: Can be called by anyone after expiry if target not met

betaLP().notice: LP lock ratio (e.g., 7000 = 70% of raised funds for LP)

hasClaimedRefund(address).notice: Mapping of users who claimed refund

minRaiseRatio().notice: Minimum raise ratio (e.g., 7500 = 75%, must sell at least 75% to succeed)

refundRate().notice: Refund rate (USDC per token) when IDO fails

sellTokens(uint256,uint256).notice: Sell tokens back to contract for USDC

targetTokens().notice: Target tokens to sell (100% of salable tokens)

triggerRefund().notice: Trigger refund process if IDO failed
